name: Bonbon Dragon
description:
An ancient, powerful, and candy-loving dragon just found out about trick-or-treating... Welcome to a fantasy zone.

CONTROL:

Fire (Keyboard Z/X or Controller A/B) - Tap to shoot a Fireball.  Hold to Lock-on and release to fire lock on lasers.

Aim (Keyboard arrows or Controller D-Pad) - Move the target reticle (the dragon will align herself on her own)

INSTRUCTIONS:

Shoot houses, pumpkins, and balloons with Fireballs to make the candy pop out.  Rocks cannot be destroyed by fire, and do not contain candy.

Hold Fire to activate lock-on mode (indicated by a square-shaped aiming reticle). Target the candy that pops out by moving the aiming reticle over them and release Fire to fire the lock-on lasers.

Candy hit by the lasers will fly towards you at high speed!

Collecting a lot of candy in a short amount of time will result in more points and extra bonus time per candy.  Try to get as many targets as you can in one go!

Colliding with anything that isn't candy will cause you to lose time and your lock-on targets, so watch out.
